title: Pistachio baklava with vanilla nectarines and cardamom custard
description: Spices are used in surprising ways in this dish of baklava topped with orange syrup and served with vanilla nectarines and cardamom custard.
ingredients: 2 large oranges, juice of 2 oranges, zest of 1 orange
6 nectarines, cut in half and stone removed
